title: Operation Language Stories | I need your help!

media:group.media:title: Operation Language Stories | I need your help!
media:group.media:description:
***What I need from you***
Leave me a comment below with a very short story (100-300 words) using simple language appropriate for a beginner language student.  
I personally am going to pay for some of these stories to be translated into Thai. If you feel inclined to translate (or pay for translations) some of these stories into the language you are learning, please send me the translations, and I will post them all for anyone to use for free!

* If you post a story below, you are giving your consent for the story to be shared in the Operation Language Stories library, and anywhere that our stories are shared, published, posted and distributed.

Links:
Operation Language Stories website: https://sites.google.com/view/fingtamlessons/open-source-lessons
Hire translators on Fiverr: https://www.fiverr.com/search/gigs?query=thai%20translator&source=main_banner&search_in=everywhere&search-autocomplete-original-term=thai%20translator

______________________________________________________________

If you would like to join a community of dedicated language learners and support my channel, check out the Fingtam Languages Patreon here: www.Patreon.com/Fingtam
Huge thanks to Joltrast, Tobi, INK, Adam, Larry, Antonio, Andy, Jose, Michael, Katrina, Paula, Johnny, and Jason for supporting my channel on Patreon!

New to my channel?

Welcome! I am an aspiring polyglot with a degree in Linguistics.  I speak English, Spanish, French, and Esperanto, and I'm currently working on Thai. I make videos twice a week to talk about my methods of learning languages and to try to help others make language learning faster, easier, and more fun. 

•Twitter: https://twitter.com/fingtamLangs

•Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fingtam.languages/?hl=en

•My Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/FingtamLanguages

•Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/c/FingtamLanguages?sub_confirmation=1
